short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between touch and default cursor in any Figma prototype

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between touch and default cursor in any Figma prototype. This is especially useful when you want to record mobile prototypes in non-standard frame sizes. No more desktop cursors on mobile UI!
